provisions.content:

provisions.content:
11.--(I) A strategic review of the operations of each Executive Agency Smegic

        (3) The purpose of the strategic review shall be to provide-
      (a) an evaluation of the. Agency's performance against key perfor-
          mance indicators; and
      (6) an assessment of the efficacy of the service delivery of the
          Agency.
      (4) The findings of the strategic review shall be used to update the
Framework Document and other relevant documents in the Scheme of
Management.
        (5) The expenses of the strategic review shall be paid out of the
funds of the Agency.
